mention.text: The US Environmental Protection Agency -LRB- EPA -RRB-
its proposed carbon pollution reduction rule
a stronghold of the climate-change skeptic Republican Party , which has a history of blocking anti-emission legislation
a step towards meeting the goals of President Barack Obama
